tool.name: Minfi rset
tool.description: store Beta values and/or M values

configfiles.configfile:
require("minfi", quietly = TRUE) MSet <- get(load('$mset'))
RSet <- ratioConvert(MSet, what = "both", keepCN = TRUE)
save(RSet,file = '$rset')

param.name: mset
param.label: MethylSet
param.help: This class holds preprocessed data for Illumina methylation microarrays, mapped to a genomic location.

tool.help: RSet class holds preprocessed data for Illumina methylation microarrays. It contains respectively the Beta value matrix, M value matrix and the Copy Number matrix.
